The flight anchor requires an immense amount of power to operate.
For each RPM, you will be able to fly one block around the anchor.
Higher speeds cover a much higher surface area.
tooltip.balancedflightplus.ascended_flig: An incredibly dense golden ring, and yet, it allows flight anywhere.
tooltip.balancedflightplus.flight_anchor: Allows flight in a 25 block radius. Only works in the overworld.
tooltip.balancedflightplus.flight_disrup: Allows flight in a 25 block radius. Only works in the overworld.
tooltip.balancedflightplus.placement_dis: Allows flight in a 25 block radius. Only works in the overworld.
